17607065Di2015UniqueSeparator"\\b(new|var|string|...)\\b"
17607065Di2015UniqueSeparator"type"
17607065Di2015UniqueSeparator"keyword"
17607065Di2015UniqueSeparator//Simple Regex for stringsDi2015NewLinestring StringRegex = "\\"(?:[^\\"\\\\\\\\]|\\\\\\\\.)*\\"";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Simple Regex for commentsDi2015NewLinestring CommentRegex = @"//.*|/\\*[\\s\\S]*\\*/";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Simple Regex for keywordsDi2015NewLinestring KeywordRegex = @"\\b(?:new|var|string)\\b";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Create a dictionary relating token types to regexesDi2015NewLineDictionary<string, string> Regexes = new Dictionary<string, string>()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    {"String", StringRegex},Di2015NewLine    {"Comment", CommentRegex},Di2015NewLine    {"Keyword", KeywordRegex}Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Define a string to tokenizeDi2015NewLinestring input = "string myString = \\"Hi! this is my new string!\\"//Defines a new string.";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Lexer steps:Di2015NewLine//1). Find all of the matches from the regexesDi2015NewLine//2). Convert them to tokensDi2015NewLine//3). Order the tokens by index then priorityDi2015NewLine//4). Loop through each of the tokens comparingDi2015NewLine//    the current match with the next match,Di2015NewLine//    if the next match is partially contained by this matchDi2015NewLine//    (or if they both occupy the same space) remove it.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//** Sorry for the complex LINQ expression (not really) **Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Match each regex to the input string(Step 1)Di2015NewLinevar matches = Regexes.SelectMany(a => Regex.Matches(input, a.Value)Di2015NewLine//Cast each match because MatchCollection does not implement IEnumerable<T>Di2015NewLine.Cast<Match>()Di2015NewLine//Select a new token for each match(Step 2)Di2015NewLine.Select(b => Di2015NewLine        newDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Index = b.Index,Di2015NewLine            Value = b.Value,Di2015NewLine            Type = a.Key //Type is based on the current regex.Di2015NewLine        }))Di2015NewLine//Order each token by the index (Step 3)Di2015NewLine.OrderBy(a => a.Index).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Loop through the tokens(Step 4)Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < matches.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Compare the current token with the next token to see if it is containedDi2015NewLine    if (i + 1 < matches.Count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int firstEndPos = (matches[i].Index + matches[i].Value.Length);Di2015NewLine        if (firstEndPos > matches[(i + 1)].Index)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Remove the next token from the list and stay atDi2015NewLine            //the current matchDi2015NewLine            matches.RemoveAt(i + 1);Di2015NewLine            i--;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Now matches contains all of the right matchesDi2015NewLine//Filter the matches by the Type to single out keywords from comments andDi2015NewLine//string literals.Di2015NewLineforeach(var match in matches)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(match);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineConsole.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine
17607134Di2015UniqueSeparatorTask.Factory.StartNew<T>
17607134Di2015UniqueSeparatorreturn Task.Factory.StartNew<int>(() => {Di2015NewLine    // ...Di2015NewLine    return 1;Di2015NewLine});Di2015NewLine

17610043Di2015UniqueSeparatorDECLARE @userIds NVARCHAR(MAX)Di2015NewLineSET @userIds ='1,2,3,4,5,6'Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCREATE table #TempUser Di2015NewLine(Di2015NewLine    userId IntDi2015NewLine) Di2015NewLineDECLARE @SplitOn VARCHAR(1)Di2015NewLineSET @SplitOn = ','Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineWhile (Charindex(@SplitOn,@userIds)>0)Di2015NewLineBeginDi2015NewLine    Insert Into #TempUser (userId)Di2015NewLine    Select Di2015NewLine        userId = ltrim(rtrim(Substring(@userIds ,1,Charindex(@SplitOn,@userIds )-1)))Di2015NewLine    Set @userIds = Substring(@userIds,Charindex(@SplitOn,@userIds)+1,len(@userIds))Di2015NewLineEndDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineInsert Into #TempUser (userId)Di2015NewLineSelect Data = ltrim(rtrim(@userIds))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSELECT * FROM #TempUserDi2015NewLine

17613630Di2015UniqueSeparator    void AwaitFile()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Your FileDi2015NewLine        var file  = new FileInfo("yourFile");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //While File is not accesable because of writing processDi2015NewLine        while (IsFileLocked(file)) { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //File is available hereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Code by ChrisW -> http://stackoverflow.com/questions/876473/is-there-a-way-to-check-if-a-file-is-in-useDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    protected virtual bool IsFileLocked(FileInfo file)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        FileStream stream = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            stream = file.Open(FileMode.Open, FileAccess.ReadWrite, FileShare.None);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (IOException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (stream != null)Di2015NewLine                stream.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //file is not lockedDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

Role> Roles = new Dictionary<string, Role>(); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Role GetRole(string key) {Di2015NewLine        if (Roles.ContainsKey(key))Di2015NewLine            return             continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Roles[key] = role;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return role;Di2015NewLine            }           Di2015NewLine 17625455Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static BlockingCollection<int> _pool;Di2015NewLinepublic static void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    _pool = new BlockingCollection<int>();Di2015NewLine    Task.Run(() => //This is run in another thread so it shows data is being taken out and put in at the same timeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for(int i = 1; i <= 1000; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _pool.Add(i);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _pool.CompleteAdding(); //Lets the foreach know no new items will be showing up.Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //This will work on the items in _pool, if there is no items in the collection it will block till CompleteAdding() is called.Di2015NewLine    Parallel.ForEach(_pool.GetConsumingEnumerable(), new ParallelOptions {MaxDegreeOfParallelism = 3}, Worker);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void Worker(int num)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        // do a long process hereDi2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

17626105Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineinternal static class AssemblyLoaderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    internal static void RegisterAssemblyLoader()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AppDomain currentDomain = AppDomain.CurrentDomain;Di2015NewLine        currentDomain.AssemblyResolve -= OnResolveAssembly;Di2015NewLine        currentDomain.AssemblyResolve += OnResolveAssembly;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Assembly OnResolveAssembly(object sender, ResolveEventArgs args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return LoadAssemblyFromManifest(args.Name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Assembly LoadAssemblyFromManifest(string targetAssemblyName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Assembly executingAssembly = Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly();Di2015NewLine        AssemblyName assemblyName = new AssemblyName(targetAssemblyName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string resourceName = DetermineEmbeddedResourceName(assemblyName, executingAssembly);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (Stream stream = executingAssembly.GetManifestResourceStream(resourceName))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (stream == null)Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] assemblyRawBytes = new byte[stream.Length];Di2015NewLine            stream.Read(assemblyRawBytes, 0, assemblyRawBytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return Assembly.Load(assemblyRawBytes);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string DetermineEmbeddedResourceName(AssemblyName assemblyName, Assembly executingAssembly)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //This assumes you have the assemblies in a folder named "EmbeddedAssemblies"Di2015NewLine        string resourceName = string.Format("{0}.EmbeddedAssemblies.{1}.dll",Di2015NewLine                                            executingAssembly.GetName().Name, assemblyName.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //This logic finds the assembly manifest name even if it's not an case match for the requested assembly                          Di2015NewLine        var matchingResource = executingAssembly.GetManifestResourceNames()Di2015NewLine                                                .FirstOrDefault(res => res.ToLower() == resourceName.ToLower());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (matchingResource != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            resourceName = matchingResource;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return resourceName;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17627283Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class _Default : System.Web.UI.Page {Di2015NewLine    const string BITMAP_ID_BLOCK = "BM";Di2015NewLine    const string JPG_ID_BLOCK = "\\u00FF\\u00D8\\u00FF";Di2015NewLine    const string PNG_ID_BLOCK = "\\u0089PNG\\r\\n\\u001a\\n";Di2015NewLine    const string GIF_ID_BLOCK = "GIF8";Di2015NewLine    const string TIFF_ID_BLOCK = "II*\\u0000";Di2015NewLine    const int DEFAULT_OLEHEADERSIZE = 78;Di2015NewLine    public static byte[] ConvertOleObjectToByteArray(object content) {Di2015NewLine        if (content != null && !(content is DBNull)) {Di2015NewLine            byte[] oleFieldBytes = (byte[])content;Di2015NewLine            byte[] imageBytes = null;Di2015NewLine            // Get a UTF7 Encoded string versionDi2015NewLine            Encoding u8 = Encoding.UTF7;Di2015NewLine            string strTemp = u8.GetString(oleFieldBytes);Di2015NewLine            // Get the first 300 characters from the stringDi2015NewLine            string strVTemp = strTemp.Substring(0, 300);Di2015NewLine            // Search for the blockDi2015NewLine            int iPos = -1;Di2015NewLine            if (strVTemp.IndexOf(BITMAP_ID_BLOCK) != -1) {Di2015NewLine                iPos = strVTemp.IndexOf(BITMAP_ID_BLOCK);Di2015NewLine            } else if (strVTemp.IndexOf(JPG_ID_BLOCK) != -1) {Di2015NewLine                iPos = strVTemp.IndexOf(JPG_ID_BLOCK);Di2015NewLine            } else if (strVTemp.IndexOf(PNG_ID_BLOCK) != -1) {Di2015NewLine                iPos = strVTemp.IndexOf(PNG_ID_BLOCK);Di2015NewLine            } else if (strVTemp.IndexOf(GIF_ID_BLOCK) != -1) {Di2015NewLine                iPos = strVTemp.IndexOf(GIF_ID_BLOCK);Di2015NewLine            } else if (strVTemp.IndexOf(TIFF_ID_BLOCK) != -1) {Di2015NewLine                iPos = strVTemp.IndexOf(TIFF_ID_BLOCK);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // From the position above get the new imageDi2015NewLine            if (iPos == -1) {Di2015NewLine                iPos = DEFAULT_OLEHEADERSIZE;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            //Array.Copy(Di2015NewLine            imageBytes = new byte[oleFieldBytes.LongLength - iPos];Di2015NewLine            MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine            ms.Write(oleFieldBytes, iPos, oleFieldBytes.Length - iPos);Di2015NewLine            imageBytes = ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine            ms.Close();Di2015NewLine            ms.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            return imageBytes;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17638856Di2015UniqueSeparator10
17638874Di2015UniqueSeparator        private void ResizeBitmapAndSendToWebServer(string album_id) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            BitmapFactory.Options options = new BitmapFactory.Options ();Di2015NewLine            options.InJustDecodeBounds = true; // <-- This makes sure bitmap is not loaded into memory.Di2015NewLine            // Then get the properties of the bitmapDi2015NewLine            BitmapFactory.DecodeFile (fileUri.Path, options);Di2015NewLine            Android.Util.Log.Debug ("[BITMAP]" , string.Format("Original width : {0}, and height : {1}", options.OutWidth, options.OutHeight) );Di2015NewLine            // CalculateInSampleSize calculates the right aspect ratio for the picture and then calculateDi2015NewLine            // the factor where it will be downsampled with.Di2015NewLine            options.InSampleSize = CalculateInSampleSize (options, 1600, 1200);Di2015NewLine            Android.Util.Log.Debug ("[BITMAP]" , string.Format("Downsampling factor : {0}", CalculateInSampleSize (options, 1600, 1200)) );Di2015NewLine            // Now that we know the downsampling factor, the right sized bitmap is loaded into memory.Di2015NewLine            // So we set the InJustDecodeBounds to false because we now know the exact dimensions.Di2015NewLine            options.InJustDecodeBounds = false;Di2015NewLine            // Now we are loading it with the correct options. And saving precious memory.Di2015NewLine            Bitmap bm = BitmapFactory.DecodeFile (fileUri.Path, options);Di2015NewLine            Android.Util.Log.Debug ("[BITMAP]" , string.Format("Downsampled width : {0}, and height : {1}", bm.Width, bm.Height) );Di2015NewLine            // Convert it to Base64 by first converting the bitmap toDi2015NewLine            // a byte array. Then convert the byte array to a Base64 String.Di2015NewLine            MemoryStream stream = new MemoryStream ();Di2015NewLine            bm.Compress (Bitmap.CompressFormat.Jpeg, 80, stream);Di2015NewLine            byte[] bitmapData = stream.ToArray ();Di2015NewLine            bm.Dispose ();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            app.api.SendPhoto (Base64.EncodeToString (bitmapData, Base64Flags.Default), album_id);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

17640699Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void Initialize(Array array)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var rank = array.Rank;Di2015NewLine    var dimensionLengths = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine    var totalSize = 1;Di2015NewLine    int[] arrayIndices = new int[rank];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (var dimension = 0; dimension < rank; dimension++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var upperBound = array.GetLength(dimension);Di2015NewLine        dimensionLengths.Add(upperBound);Di2015NewLine        totalSize *= upperBound;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var singleArray = new int[totalSize];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < totalSize; i++) singleArray[i] = i;Di2015NewLine    singleArray = Shuffle(singleArray);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < singleArray.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var remainingIndex = i;Di2015NewLine        for (var dimension = array.Rank - 1; dimension >= 0; dimension--)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            arrayIndices[dimension] = remainingIndex%dimensionLengths[dimension];Di2015NewLine            remainingIndex /= dimensionLengths[dimension];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Now, set the appropriate cell in your real array:Di2015NewLine        array.SetValue(singleArray[i], arrayIndices);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17640699Di2015UniqueSeparatorarray.SetValue(value, params int[] indices)
17640699Di2015UniqueSeparatorShuffle
17640699Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static int[] Shuffle(int[] singleArray)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var random = new Random();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = singleArray.Length; i > 1; i--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Pick random element to swap.Di2015NewLine        int j = random.Next(i); // 0 <= j <= i-1Di2015NewLine        // Swap.Di2015NewLine        int tmp = singleArray[j];Di2015NewLine        singleArray[j] = singleArray[i - 1];Di2015NewLine        singleArray[i - 1] = tmp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return singleArray;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17641489Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class MyConvertingClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static T Convert<T>(APIElement element)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Type type = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine        if (conversions.ContainsKey(type))Di2015NewLine            return (T)conversions[type](element);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            throw new FormatException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static readonly Dictionary<System.Type, Func<Element, object>> conversions = new Dictionary<Type,Func<Element,object>>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        { typeof(bool), n => n.GetValueAsBool() },Di2015NewLine        { typeof(char), n => n.GetValueAsChar() },Di2015NewLine        { typeof(DateTime), n => n.GetValueAsDatetime() },Di2015NewLine        { typeof(float), n => n.GetValueAsFloat32() },Di2015NewLine        { typeof(double), n => n.GetValueAsFloat64() },Di2015NewLine        { typeof(int), n => n.GetValueAsInt32() },Di2015NewLine        { typeof(long), n => n.GetValueAsInt64() },Di2015NewLine        { typeof(string), n => n.GetValueAsString() }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17642175Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<List<int>> list = new List<List<int>>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                new List<int>() {1, 3, 6}, //Booking 1Di2015NewLine                new List<int>() {1, 2, 6}, //Booking 2Di2015NewLine                new List<int>() {1}, //Booking 3Di2015NewLine                new List<int>() {2, 3}Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine        List<int[]> solutions = new List<int[]>();Di2015NewLine        int[] solution = new int[list.Count];Di2015NewLine        Solve(list, solutions, solution);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void Solve(List<List<int>> list, List<int[]> solutions, int[] solution)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (solution.All(i => i != 0) && !solutions.Any(s => s.SequenceEqual(solution)))Di2015NewLine            solutions.Add(solution);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < list.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (solution[i] != 0)Di2015NewLine                continue; // a caller up the hierarchy set this index to be a numberDi2015NewLine            for (int j = 0; j < list[i].Count; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (solution.Contains(list[i][j]))Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                var solutionCopy = solution.ToArray();Di2015NewLine                solutionCopy[i] = list[i][j];Di2015NewLine                Solve(list, solutions, solutionCopy);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

17650288Di2015UniqueSeparator        var dt=new DataTable();Di2015NewLine        dt.Columns.Add("A", typeof (string));Di2015NewLine        dt.Columns.Add("B", typeof (string));Di2015NewLine        dt.Columns.Add("C", typeof (int));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        dt.Rows.Add("John", "Doe", 23);Di2015NewLine        dt.Rows.Add("John", "Doe", 24);Di2015NewLine        dt.Rows.Add("John", "Doe", 25);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var result = from row in dt.AsEnumerable()Di2015NewLine                     group row by new {A=row.Field<string>("A"), B=row.Field<string>("B")} into grpDi2015NewLine                     select newDi2015NewLine                     {Di2015NewLine                         CustomerName = grp.Key,Di2015NewLine                         Items = String.Join(",",grp.Select(r=>r.Field<int>("C")))Di2015NewLine                     };Di2015NewLine        foreach (var t in result)Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(t.CustomerName + " " + t.Items);Di2015NewLine
17650458Di2015UniqueSeparator//m_text is the whole text i want to write. It may contain special characters,Di2015NewLine//like 'enter', 'tab', lower/upper-case chars, and chars with shit/alt isDi2015NewLine//pressed, like ';'.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Test with this string, its difficult-enough. :)Di2015NewLine                string m_text = "123qweQWE;{tab}!{eNTer}*|";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                IntPtr keyboardLayout = GetKeyboardLayout(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                while (!string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(m_text))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int m_Index = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //Enter, tab and similar keys are in {} bracketsDi2015NewLine                    //(for example {tab}). We get the 'tab' from theDi2015NewLine                    //string and pass this to our method. Key combinationsDi2015NewLine                    //are separated by a '+' like {alt+tab+tab}, from thisDi2015NewLine                    //we will get 'press the alt, then press the tab, thenDi2015NewLine                    //press the tab again'.Di2015NewLine                    if (m_text[m_Index] == '{')Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        #region [ Special chars ]Di2015NewLine                        string m_SubString = m_text.Substring(Di2015NewLine                                                    m_Index + 1, m_text.IndexOf("}") - 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        string[] m_Splitted = m_SubString.Split(new char[] { '+' });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        for (int i = 0; i < m_Splitted.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            //If the string is longer than 1 char it means we are processing a tab-like key.Di2015NewLine                            if (m_Splitted[i].Length > 1)Di2015NewLine                                PressSpecial(m_Splitted[i]);Di2015NewLine                            elseDi2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                //If the char is 1-char-long, it means we previously pressed a tab-like key,Di2015NewLine                                //and now we press a simple key, like in the case of {altgr+w}.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                //Get the virtual key of the char.Di2015NewLine                                short vKey = VkKeyScanEx(Di2015NewLine                                    char.Parse(m_Splitted[i]), keyboardLayout);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                //Get the low byte from the virtual key.Di2015NewLine                                byte m_LOWBYTE = (Byte)(vKey & 0xFF);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                //Get the scan code of the key.Di2015NewLine                                byte sScan = (byte)MapVirtualKey(m_LOWBYTE, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                //Press the key.Di2015NewLine                                //Key down event, as indicated by the 3rd parameter that is 0.Di2015NewLine                                keybd_event(m_LOWBYTE, sScan, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        Application.DoEvents();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //We have pressed all the keys we wanted, now release them in backward-orderDi2015NewLine                        //when pressing alt+tab we beed to release them in tab-alt order! The logic is the same.Di2015NewLine                        for (int i = m_Splitted.Length - 1; i > -1; i--)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            if (m_Splitted[i].Length > 1)Di2015NewLine                                ReleaseSpecial(m_Splitted[i]);Di2015NewLine                            elseDi2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                short vKey = VkKeyScanEx(Di2015NewLine                                    char.Parse(m_Splitted[i]), keyboardLayout);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                byte m_LOWBYTE = (Byte)(vKey & 0xFF);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                byte sScan = (byte)MapVirtualKey(m_LOWBYTE, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                //Key up event, as indicated by the 3rd parameter that is 0x0002.Di2015NewLine                                keybd_event(m_LOWBYTE, sScan, 0x0002, 0); //Key upDi2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        Application.DoEvents();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //We do not use the '{' and '}' brackets, thats why the '+2'. :)Di2015NewLine                        m_Index = m_SubString.Length + 2;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        #region [ One char ]Di2015NewLine                        short vKey = VkKeyScanEx(m_text[m_Index], keyboardLayout);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Hi-byte indicates if we need to press shift, alt or other similar keys.Di2015NewLine                        byte m_HIBYTE = (Byte)(vKey >> 8);Di2015NewLine                        byte m_LOWBYTE = (Byte)(vKey & 0xFF);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        byte sScan = (byte)MapVirtualKey(m_LOWBYTE, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Press the special key if needed.Di2015NewLine                        if ((m_HIBYTE == 1))Di2015NewLine                            PressShift();Di2015NewLine                        else if ((m_HIBYTE == 2))Di2015NewLine                            PressControl();Di2015NewLine                        else if ((m_HIBYTE == 4))Di2015NewLine                            PressAlt();Di2015NewLine                        else if ((m_HIBYTE == 6))Di2015NewLine                            PressAltGr();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Press, then release the key.Di2015NewLine                        keybd_event(m_LOWBYTE, sScan, 0, 0); //Key downDi2015NewLine                        keybd_event(m_LOWBYTE, sScan, 0x0002, 0); //Key upDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Release the special key if needed.Di2015NewLine                        if ((m_HIBYTE == 1))Di2015NewLine                            ReleaseShift();Di2015NewLine                        else if ((m_HIBYTE == 2))Di2015NewLine                            ReleaseControl();Di2015NewLine                        else if ((m_HIBYTE == 4))Di2015NewLine                            ReleaseAlt();Di2015NewLine                        else if ((m_HIBYTE == 6))Di2015NewLine                            ReleaseAltGr();Di2015NewLine                        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Get the next char from the string.Di2015NewLine                        m_Index++;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //Remove the already processed chars from the string.Di2015NewLine                    if (m_Index < m_text.Length)Di2015NewLine                        m_text = m_text.Substring(m_Index);Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                        m_text = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine
17650458Di2015UniqueSeparator#region [ Press shift ]Di2015NewLineprivate void PressShift()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //0xA0 is the virtual key of 'shift'.Di2015NewLine    //0x2A is the scan code of 'shift'.Di2015NewLine    keybd_event(0xA0, 0x2A, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine#endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#region [ Release shift ]Di2015NewLineprivate void ReleaseShift()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    keybd_event(0xA0, 0x2A, 0x0002, 0);Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine#endregionDi2015NewLine
17650458Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void PressSpecial(string p_Special)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    switch (p_Special.ToLower()) //<-- use lower version!Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case "home":Di2015NewLine            keybd_event(0x24, 0x47, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case "end":Di2015NewLine            keybd_event(0x23, 0x4F, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        //Do the same for any key you need (enter, tab, page up, etc...).Di2015NewLine        //Remember to get the proper virtual- and scan codes for each keys!Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17650458Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ReleaseSpecial(string p_Special)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    switch (p_Special.ToLower())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case "home":Di2015NewLine            keybd_event(0x24, 0x47, 0x0002, 0);Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case "end":Di2015NewLine            keybd_event(0x23, 0x4F, 0x0002, 0);Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17654232Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Truncates the TextBox.Text property so it will fit in the TextBox. Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    static public void Truncate(this TextBox textBox)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Determine direction of truncationDi2015NewLine        bool direction = false;Di2015NewLine        if (textBox.TextAlign == HorizontalAlignment.Right) direction = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Get textDi2015NewLine        string truncatedText = textBox.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Truncate textDi2015NewLine        truncatedText = truncatedText.Truncate(textBox.Font, textBox.Width, direction);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //If text truncatedDi2015NewLine        if (truncatedText != textBox.Text)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Set textBox textDi2015NewLine            textBox.Text = truncatedText;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //After setting the text, the cursor position changes. Here we set the location of the cursor manually.Di2015NewLine            //First we determine the position, the default value applies to direction = left.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //This position is when the cursor needs to be behind the last char. (Example:"My Text|");Di2015NewLine            int position = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //If the truncation direction is to the right the position should be before the ellipsisDi2015NewLine            if (!direction)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //This position is when the cursor needs to be before the last char (which would be the ellipsis). (Example:"My Text|");Di2015NewLine                position = 1; Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Set the cursor positionDi2015NewLine            textBox.Select(textBox.Text.Length - position, 0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Truncates the string to be smaller than the desired width.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="font">The font used to determine the size of the string.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="width">The maximum size the string should be after truncating.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="direction">The direction of the truncation. True for left (ext), False for right(Tex).</param>Di2015NewLine    static public string Truncate(this string text, Font font, int width, bool direction)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string truncatedText, returnText;Di2015NewLine        int charIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine        bool truncated = false;Di2015NewLine        //When the user is typing and the truncation happens in a TextChanged event, already typed text could get lost.Di2015NewLine        //Example: Imagine that the string "Hello Worl" would truncate if we add 'd'. Depending on the font the output Di2015NewLine        //could be: "Hello Wor" (notice the 'l' is missing). This is an undesired effect.Di2015NewLine        //To prevent this from happening the ellipsis is included in the initial sizecheck.Di2015NewLine        //At this point, the direction is not important so we place ellipsis behind the text.Di2015NewLine        truncatedText = text + "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Get the size of the string in pixels.Di2015NewLine        SizeF size = MeasureString(truncatedText, font);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Do while the string is bigger than the desired width.Di2015NewLine        while (size.Width > width)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Go to next charDi2015NewLine            charIndex++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //If the character index is larger than or equal to the length of the text, the truncation is unachievable.Di2015NewLine            if (charIndex >= text.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Truncation is unachievable!Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Throw exception so the user knows what's going on.Di2015NewLine                throw new IndexOutOfRangeException("The desired width of the string is too small to truncate to.");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Truncation is still applicable!Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Raise the flag, indicating that text is truncated.Di2015NewLine                truncated = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Check which way to text should be truncated to, then remove one char and add an ellipsis.Di2015NewLine                if (direction)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //Truncate to the left. Add ellipsis and remove from the left.Di2015NewLine                    truncatedText = "" + text.Substring(charIndex);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //Truncate to the right. Remove from the right and add the ellipsis.Di2015NewLine                    truncatedText = text.Substring(0, text.Length - charIndex) + "";Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Measure the string again.Di2015NewLine                size = MeasureString(truncatedText, font);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //If the text got truncated, change the return value to the truncated text.Di2015NewLine        if (truncated) returnText = truncatedText;Di2015NewLine        else returnText = text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Return the desired text.Di2015NewLine        return returnText;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Measures the size of this string object.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="text">The string that will be measured.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="font">The font that will be used to measure to size of the string.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>A SizeF object containing the height and size of the string.</returns>Di2015NewLine    static private SizeF MeasureString(String text, Font font)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //To measure the string we use the Graphics.MeasureString function, which is a method that can be called from a PaintEventArgs instance.Di2015NewLine        //To call the constructor of the PaintEventArgs class, we must pass a Graphics object. We'll use a PictureBox object to achieve this. Di2015NewLine        PictureBox pb = new PictureBox();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Create the PaintEventArgs with the correct parameters.Di2015NewLine        PaintEventArgs pea = new PaintEventArgs(pb.CreateGraphics(), new System.Drawing.Rectangle());Di2015NewLine        pea.Graphics.PageUnit = GraphicsUnit.Pixel;Di2015NewLine        pea.Graphics.PageScale = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Call the MeasureString method. This methods calculates what the height and width of a string would be, given the specified font.Di2015NewLine        SizeF size = pea.Graphics.MeasureString(text, font);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Return the SizeF object.Di2015NewLine        return size;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17654232Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void textBox1_TextChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    textBox1.Truncate();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17654589Di2015UniqueSeparator// group by Year-MonthDi2015NewLinevar rows = from s in saleListDi2015NewLine    orderby s.MonthYearDi2015NewLine    group s by new { Year = s.MonthYear.Year, Month = s.MonthYear.Month };Di2015NewLine
17654589Di2015UniqueSeparatorSaleMonth
17654589Di2015UniqueSeparatorFullMonths
17654589Di2015UniqueSeparatorDaysMonths
17654589Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar rowsTotals = from s in saleListDi2015NewLine    orderby s.MonthYearDi2015NewLine    group s by new { Year = s.MonthYear.Year, Month = s.MonthYear.Month } into grpDi2015NewLine    select newDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        YearMonth = grp.Key.Year + " " + grp.Key.Month,Di2015NewLine        FullMonthTotal = grp.Sum (x => x.FullMonth),Di2015NewLine        DaysMonthTotal = grp.Sum (x => x.DaysMonth)Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine
17654589Di2015UniqueSeparator// populate our class with the time period we are interested inDi2015NewLinevar startDate = saleList.Min (x => x.ActivationDate);Di2015NewLinevar endDate = saleList.Max (x => x.EndDate);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineList<SaleMonth> salesReport = new List<SaleMonth>();Di2015NewLinefor(var i = new DateTime(startDate.Year, startDate.Month, 1); Di2015NewLine    i <= new DateTime(endDate.Year, endDate.Month, 1);Di2015NewLine    i = i.AddMonths(1))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    salesReport.Add(new SaleMonth { MonthYear = i });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// loop through each Month-YearDi2015NewLineforeach(var sr in salesReport)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // get all the sales that happen in this monthDi2015NewLine    var lastDayThisMonth = sr.MonthYear.AddMonths(1).AddDays(-1);Di2015NewLine    var sales = from s in saleListDi2015NewLine        where lastDayThisMonth >= s.ActivationDate, Di2015NewLine        where sr.MonthYear <= s.EndDateDi2015NewLine    select s;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // calculate the number of days the sale spans for just this monthDi2015NewLine    var nextMonth = sr.MonthYear.AddMonths(1);Di2015NewLine    var firstOfNextMonth = sr.MonthYear.AddMonths(1).AddDays(-1).Day;Di2015NewLine    sr.DaysMonth = sales.Sum (x =>Di2015NewLine        (x.EndDate < nextMonth ? x.EndDate.Day : firstOfNextMonth) -Di2015NewLine            (sr.MonthYear > x.ActivationDate ? Di2015NewLine             sr.MonthYear.Day : x.ActivationDate.Day));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // how many sales occur over the entire monthDi2015NewLine    sr.FullMonth = sales.Where (x => x.ActivationDate <= sr.MonthYear && Di2015NewLine                                nextMonth < x.EndDate).Count ();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17654795Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void Refresh() {Di2015NewLine  for (int i = 1; i < canvasboard.Children.Count; ++i) {Di2015NewLine    var currentElement = canvasboard.Children[i] as FrameworkElement;Di2015NewLine    var previousElement = canvasboard.Children[i - 1] as FrameworkElement;Di2015NewLine    if (currentElement == null || previousElement == null)Di2015NewLine      return;Di2015NewLine    var requiredTop = Canvas.GetTop(previousElement) + previousElement.Height - 1;Di2015NewLine    if (Math.Abs(Canvas.GetTop(currentElement) - requiredTop) > 0.0)Di2015NewLine      Canvas.SetTop(currentElement, requiredTop);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

     score = (score/(counter-1));Di2015NewLine                    if (score < 60)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Console.WriteLine("Letter Grade: F");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if (60 <= score && score < 70)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Console.WriteLine("Letter Grade: D");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if (70 <= score && score < 80)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Console.WriteLine("Letter Grade: C");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if (80 <= score && score < 90)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Console.WriteLine("Letter Grade: B");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else if (90 <= score)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Console.WriteLine("Letter Grade: A");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Grade: {0}",(score/100).ToString("P"));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17669427Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Cryptography;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace Encryption_test_appDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var encoding = new UTF8Encoding(false, true);Di2015NewLine            var cryptor = new RijndaelEncryptor();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var plainText = "Hello World!";Di2015NewLine            Debug.Print("Plain Text: [{0}]", plainText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            byte[] cypherBytes = cryptor.Encrypt(encoding.GetBytes(plainText));Di2015NewLine            string decryptedText = encoding.GetString(cryptor.Decrypt(cypherBytes));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Debug.Print("Decrypted Text: [{0}]", decryptedText);Di2015NewLine            Debug.Print("PlainText == Decrypted Text: [{0}]", plainText == decryptedText);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Simple class to encrypt/decrypt a byte array using the <see cref="RijndaelManaged"/> cryptographic algorithm.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public class RijndaelEncryptor : IDisposableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private RijndaelManaged _crypt = new RijndaelManaged();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region ConstructorsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="RijndaelEncryptor"/> class using a default key and initial vector (IV).Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public RijndaelEncryptor() : this("0nce @pon a time...", "There lived a princess who 1iked frogs...") { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="RijndaelEncryptor"/> class using the plain text key and initial vectorDi2015NewLine        /// which are used to construct encrypted key and IV values using the maximum allowed key and iv sizes for Di2015NewLine        /// the <see cref="RijndaelEncryptor"/> cryptographic algorithm.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="keyPassword"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="ivPassword"></param>Di2015NewLine        public RijndaelEncryptor(string keyPassword, string ivPassword) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(keyPassword)) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("keyPassword", "Cannot be null or empty");Di2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(ivPassword)) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("ivPassword", "Cannot be null or empty");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            KeyPassword = keyPassword;Di2015NewLine            IVPassword = ivPassword;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _crypt.KeySize = _crypt.LegalKeySizes[0].MaxSize;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            EncryptKey = _stringToBytes(KeyPassword, _crypt.KeySize >> 3);Di2015NewLine            EncryptIV = _stringToBytes(IVPassword, _crypt.BlockSize >> 3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="RijndaelEncryptor"/> class using the user supplied key and initial vector arrays.Di2015NewLine        /// NOTE: these arrays will be validated for use with the <see cref="RijndaelManaged"/> cypher.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="encryptedKey"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="encryptedIV"></param>Di2015NewLine        public RijndaelEncryptor(byte[] encryptedKey, byte[] encryptedIV)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (encryptedKey == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("encryptedKey");Di2015NewLine            if (encryptedIV == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("encryptedIV");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Verify encrypted key length is valid for this cryptor algo.Di2015NewLine            int keylen = encryptedKey.Length << 3;Di2015NewLine            if (!_crypt.ValidKeySize(keylen))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string errmsg = "Encryption key length(" + keylen.ToString() + ") is not for this algorithm:" + _crypt.GetType().Name;Di2015NewLine                throw new ApplicationException(errmsg);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Verify encrypted iv length is valid for this cryptor algo.Di2015NewLine            int len = encryptedIV.Length << 3;Di2015NewLine            if (len != _crypt.BlockSize)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string errmsg = "Encryption key length(" + len.ToString() + ") is not for this algorithm:" + _crypt.GetType().Name;Di2015NewLine                throw new ApplicationException(errmsg);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            EncryptKey = encryptedKey;Di2015NewLine            EncryptIV = encryptedIV;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Plain text encryption key. Is used to generate a encrypted key <see cref="EncryptKey"/>Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public string KeyPassword { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Plain text encryption initial vector. Is used to generate a encrypted IV <see cref="EncryptIV"/>Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public string IVPassword { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Encrypted encryption key. (Size must match one of the allowed sizes for this encryption method).Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public byte[] EncryptKey { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Encrypted encryption IV. (Size must match one of the allowed sizes for this encryption method).Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public byte[] EncryptIV { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Encrypts the given byte array using the defined <see cref="EncryptKey"/> and <see cref="EncryptIV"/> values.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="plaintext"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public byte[] Encrypt(byte[] plaintext)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return(_encrypt(plaintext, EncryptKey, EncryptIV));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Decrypts the given byte array using the defined <see cref="EncryptKey"/> and <see cref="EncryptIV"/> values.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="cypherBytes"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        public byte[] Decrypt(byte[] cypherBytes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (_decrypt(cypherBytes, EncryptKey, EncryptIV));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region Private Encryption methodsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Used to encrypt the plain-text key and iv values to not so easy to ready byte arrays of the given size.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="password"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="KeyByteSize"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        private byte[] _stringToBytes(string password, int KeyByteSize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] salt = new byte[] { 0x49, 0x76, 0x61, 0x6e, 0x20, 0x4d, 0x65, 0xfe, 0x00, 0xa7, 0xd3, 0x02, 0x02, 0x97, 0xc4, 0xa5, 0x32 };Di2015NewLine            PasswordDeriveBytes b = new PasswordDeriveBytes(password, salt);Di2015NewLine            return (b.GetBytes(KeyByteSize));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Encrypts the <paramref name="plainBytes"/> array using the given key and initial vector.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <remarks>Di2015NewLine        /// This routine embeds the length of the plain data at the beginning of the encrypted record. This would be Di2015NewLine        /// frowed apon by crypto experts. However, if you dont do this you may get extraneous data (extra null bytes)Di2015NewLine        /// at the end of the decrypted byte array. This embedded length is used to trim the final decrypted array to size.Di2015NewLine        /// </remarks>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="plainBytes"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="key"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="iv"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        private byte[] _encrypt(byte[] plainBytes, byte[] key, byte[] iv)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Create a MemoryStream.Di2015NewLine                using (MemoryStream mStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Create a CryptoStream using the MemoryStream Di2015NewLine                    // and the passed key and initialization vector (IV).Di2015NewLine                    using (CryptoStream cStream = new CryptoStream(mStream, _crypt.CreateEncryptor(key, iv), CryptoStreamMode.Write))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // Write the byte array to the crypto stream and flush it.Di2015NewLine                        byte[] recordLen = BitConverter.GetBytes(plainBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine                        cStream.Write(recordLen, 0, recordLen.Length);Di2015NewLine                        cStream.Write(plainBytes, 0, plainBytes.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (!cStream.HasFlushedFinalBlock)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            cStream.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // Get an array of bytes from the Di2015NewLine                        // MemoryStream that holds the Di2015NewLine                        // encrypted data.Di2015NewLine                        return(mStream.ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (CryptographicException ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ApplicationException("**ERROR** occurred during Encryption", ex);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Decrypts the <paramref name="cryptBytes"/> array using the given key and initial vector.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="plainBytes"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="key"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="iv"></param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine        private byte[] _decrypt(byte[] cryptBytes, byte[] key, byte[] iv)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Create a new MemoryStream using the passed Di2015NewLine                // array of encrypted data.Di2015NewLine                using (MemoryStream msDecrypt = new MemoryStream(cryptBytes))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Create a CryptoStream using the MemoryStream Di2015NewLine                    // and the passed key and initialization vector (IV).Di2015NewLine                    using (CryptoStream csDecrypt = new CryptoStream(msDecrypt, _crypt.CreateDecryptor(key, iv), CryptoStreamMode.Read))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        byte[] recordLen = BitConverter.GetBytes((int)0);Di2015NewLine                        csDecrypt.Read(recordLen, 0, recordLen.Length);Di2015NewLine                        int length = BitConverter.ToInt32(recordLen, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // Create buffer to hold the decrypted data.Di2015NewLine                        byte[] fromEncrypt = new byte[cryptBytes.Length - recordLen.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        // Read the decrypted data out of the crypto streamDi2015NewLine                        // and place it into the temporary buffer.Di2015NewLine                        csDecrypt.Read(fromEncrypt, 0, fromEncrypt.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        byte[] plainBytes = new byte[length];Di2015NewLine                        Array.Copy(fromEncrypt, plainBytes, length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        return (plainBytes);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (CryptographicException ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ApplicationException("**ERROR** occurred during Decryption", ex);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region IDisposable MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private bool disposed = false;  //indicates if this instance has been disposed.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void Dispose(bool disposing)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!this.disposed)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Dispose managed objectsDi2015NewLine                if (disposing)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (_crypt != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        try { _crypt.Clear(); }Di2015NewLine                        finally { _crypt = null; }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Dispose Unmanaged objectsDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            this.disposed = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Dispose(true);Di2015NewLine            GC.SuppressFinalize(this);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ~RijndaelEncryptor() { Dispose(false); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17672358Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static T Invoke<T>(Func<T> action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Dispatcher.CheckAccess())Di2015NewLine            return action();Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            T result = default(T);Di2015NewLine            ManualResetEvent reset = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine            Dispatcher.BeginInvoke(() =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result = action();Di2015NewLine                reset.Set();Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine            reset.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitMember(MemberExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.VisitMember(node);Di2015NewLine        if (CheckNull())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return node;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var member = (PropertyInfo)node.Member;Di2015NewLine        CurrentObject = member.GetValue(CurrentObject,null);Di2015NewLine        CheckNull();Di2015NewLine        return node;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool CheckNull()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (CurrentObject == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IsNull = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return IsNull;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class HelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static bool IsNull<T>(this T root,Expression<Func<T, object>> getter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var visitor = new IsNullVisitor();Di2015NewLine        visitor.CurrentObject = root;Di2015NewLine        visitor.Visit(getter);Di2015NewLine        return visitor.IsNull;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Person nullPerson = null;Di2015NewLine        var isNull_0 = nullPerson.IsNull(p => p.contact.address.city);Di2015NewLine        var isNull_1 = new Person().IsNull(p => p.contact.address.city);Di2015NewLine        var isNull_2 = new Person { contact = new Contact() }.IsNull(p => p.contact.address.city);Di2015NewLine        var isNull_3 =  new Person { contact = new Contact { address = new Address() } }.IsNull(p => p.contact.address.city);Di2015NewLine        var notnull = new Person { contact = new Contact { address = new Address { city = "LONDON" } } }.IsNull(p => p.contact.address.city);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17676843Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic class SphericalObstacleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly float _radius;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Vector3 _center;Di2015NewLine    private readonly ulong _vehicleId;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="SphericalObstacle"/> class.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="center">The center.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="radius">The radius.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="parentVehicleId">The parent vehicle id.</param>Di2015NewLine    public SphericalObstacle(Vector3 center, float radius, ulong parentVehicleId)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _radius = radius;Di2015NewLine        _center = center;Di2015NewLine        _vehicleId = parentVehicleId;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Gets the vehicle id.</summary>Di2015NewLine    public ulong VehicleId { get { return _vehicleId; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Gets the radius.</summary>Di2015NewLine    public float Radius { get { return _radius; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Gets the center.</summary>Di2015NewLine    public Vector3 Center { get { return _center; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Checks for sphere collision.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="obstacle">The obstacle.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="tolerance">The tolerance.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Di2015NewLine    ///   <c>true</c> if it collides, <c>false</c> otherwise.Di2015NewLine    /// </returns>Di2015NewLine    public bool CollidesWith(SphericalObstacle obstacle, double tolerance = 0.0d)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Vector3 difference = Center - obstacle.Center;Di2015NewLine        double distance =Di2015NewLine            System.Math.Sqrt(System.Math.Pow(difference.X, 2) + System.Math.Pow(difference.Y, 2) + System.Math.Pow(difference.Z, 2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double sumRadius = Radius + obstacle.Radius;Di2015NewLine        return distance < (sumRadius + tolerance);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return string.Format("Radius: {0}, Center: {1}", _radius, _center);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17678400Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace hex2binDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static void hex2bin(TextReader sin, BinaryWriter sout)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            char[] block = new char[2];Di2015NewLine            bool eof = false;Di2015NewLine            doDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int chars = sin.ReadBlock(block, 0, 2);Di2015NewLine                switch (chars)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case 0:Di2015NewLine                        eof = true;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    case 1:Di2015NewLine                        // Input is odd length, invalid caseDi2015NewLine                        throw new Exception("Invalid input");Di2015NewLine                    case 2:Di2015NewLine                        string sblock = new String(block);Di2015NewLine                        byte b = Convert.ToByte(sblock, 16);Di2015NewLine                        sout.Write(b);Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            } while (!eof);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (StringReader sr = new StringReader("AD5829FC"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (BinaryWriter bw = new BinaryWriter(new MemoryStream()))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    hex2bin(sr, bw);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17679675Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void OnItemSaving(object sender, EventArgs args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Item item = Event.ExtractParameter(args, 0) as Item;Di2015NewLine    if (item == null)Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    item.Fields.ReadAll(); Di2015NewLine    foreach (Field field in item.Fields)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!field.IsModified) //check if the field is modifiedDi2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Log.Audit(string.Format("OnItemSaving - Item field {0} was modified at: {1}, by user: {2}", field.DisplayName, item.Statistics.Updated.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture), item.Statistics.UpdatedBy), this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17679675Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class LogFieldChangesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public void Process(SaveArgs args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var saveItem in args.Items) //loop through item(s) being savedDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var item = Sitecore.Context.ContentDatabase.GetItem(saveItem.ID, saveItem.Language, saveItem.Version); //get the actual item being savedDi2015NewLine            if (item == null)Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var saveField in saveItem.Fields) //loop through the fields being savedDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var field = item.Fields[saveField.ID]; //retrieve the Field from the actual itemDi2015NewLine                var isModified = saveField.OriginalValue != saveField.Value; //determine if the field has been modified, we only want to log modified fieldsDi2015NewLine                if (field == null || !isModified)Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Log.Audit(string.Format("SaveUI - Item field {0} was modified at: {1}, by user: {2}", field.DisplayName, item.Statistics.Updated.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture), item.Statistics.UpdatedBy), this);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17680376Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ExcelCellIdentifier : IEquatable<ExcelCellIdentifier>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   public ExcelCellIdentifier(string ticker, string identifier)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine        Ticker = ticker;Di2015NewLine        Identifier = identifier;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public override bool Equals(object obj)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      var identifier = obj as ExcelCellIdentifier;Di2015NewLine      if(identifier == null)Di2015NewLine          return false;Di2015NewLine      elseDi2015NewLine          return Equals(identifier);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      //All this below is a common performance thing I add, if you have the two strings "Foo" and "Bar" it will give you a different hash code than the string "Bar" and "Foo", it gives you a better distribution of the hash.Di2015NewLine      uncheckedDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine          int hash = 17;Di2015NewLine          hash = hash * 23 + Ticker.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine          hash =  hash * 23 + Identifier.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine          return hash;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public string Ticker { get; set; } //This should likely be changed to {get; private set;}Di2015NewLine   public string Identifier { get; set; } //This should likely be changed to {get; private set;}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public bool Equals(ExcelCellIdentifier other)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      return Ticker.Equals(other.Ticker) && Identifier.Equals(other.Identifier);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17680376Di2015UniqueSeparator   public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      //All this below is a common performance thing I add, if you have the two strings "Foo" and "Bar" it will give you a different hash code than the string "Bar" and "Foo", it gives you a better distribution of the hash.Di2015NewLine      uncheckedDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine          int hash = 17;Di2015NewLine          hash = hash * 23 + StringComparer.OrdinalIgnoreCase.GetHashCode(Ticker);Di2015NewLine          hash =  hash * 23 + StringComparer.OrdinalIgnoreCase.GetHashCode(Identifier);Di2015NewLine          return hash;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public string Ticker { get; set; } //This should likely be changed to {get; private set;}Di2015NewLine   public string Identifier { get; set; } //This should likely be changed to {get; private set;}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public bool Equals(ExcelCellIdentifier other)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      return StringComparer.OrdinalIgnoreCase.Equals(Ticker, other.Ticker) && StringComparer.OrdinalIgnoreCase.Equals(Identifier, other.Identifier);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine

17683138Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class EnumerableExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Split<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, int groups)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var listedSource = source.ToList();Di2015NewLine        int extra;Di2015NewLine        int groupSize = Math.DivRem(listedSource.Count(), groups, out extra);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (listedSource.Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int newSize = groupSize;Di2015NewLine            if (extra > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                newSize++;Di2015NewLine                extra--;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            yield return listedSource.Take(newSize);Di2015NewLine            listedSource = listedSource.Skip(newSize).ToList();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17690190Di2015UniqueSeparatorglobal_getJsonResponse
17690190Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction global_getJsonResult(Controller, View, data, successCallback, completeCallback, methodType, returnType, jsonDataType) {Di2015NewLine    if (IsString(Controller)Di2015NewLine        && IsString(View)Di2015NewLine        && !IsUndefinedOrNull(data)) {Di2015NewLine        var ajaxData;Di2015NewLine        var ajaxType;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (typeof (data) == "string") {Di2015NewLine            ajaxData = data;Di2015NewLine            ajaxType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded"Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else {Di2015NewLine            ajaxData = JSON.stringify(data);Di2015NewLine            ajaxType = "application/json; charset=utf-8";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var method = 'POST';Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (methodType) {Di2015NewLine            method = methodType;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var dataType = 'json';Di2015NewLine        if (returnType) {Di2015NewLine            dataType = returnType;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var jsonType = 'html';Di2015NewLine        if (jsonDataType) {Di2015NewLine            jsonType = jsonDataType;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var jqXHR = $.ajax({Di2015NewLine            url: '/' + Controller + '/' + View,Di2015NewLine            headers: { JsonDataType: jsonType },Di2015NewLine            data: ajaxData,Di2015NewLine            type: method,Di2015NewLine            dataType: dataType,Di2015NewLine            contentType: ajaxType,Di2015NewLine            success: function (jsonResult) {Di2015NewLine                if (!IsUndefinedOrNull(jsonResult)Di2015NewLine                    && jsonResult.hasOwnProperty("RedirectTo")Di2015NewLine                    && !IsUndefinedOrNull(jsonResult.RedirectTo)Di2015NewLine                    && jsonResult.RedirectTo.length > 0) {Di2015NewLine                    $.fn.notify('error', 'Login Expired', 'You have been inactive for a prolonged period of time, and have been logged out of the system.');Di2015NewLine                    window.setTimeout(function () { window.location = jsonResult.RedirectTo }, 5000);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (IsFunction(successCallback)) {Di2015NewLine                    successCallback(jsonResult, Controller + '/' + View);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            },Di2015NewLine            error: function (jqXHR, textStatus, errorThrown) {Di2015NewLine                if (errorThrown != 'abort') {Di2015NewLine                    $.fn.notify('error', 'Whoops! Something went wrong.', 'We have been notified of the error.'/* textStatus + ': ' + errorThrown*/);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                log('ERROR IN global_getJsonResult() : ', textStatus, errorThrown, jqXHR);Di2015NewLine            },Di2015NewLine            complete: function (jqXHR, textStatus) {Di2015NewLine                if (IsFunction(completeCallback)) {Di2015NewLine                    completeCallback(jqXHR, textStatus, Controller + '/' + View);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return jqXHR;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17690893Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Form1 : Form {Di2015NewLine   public Form1(){Di2015NewLine      InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine      //I suppose buttons is your buttons array defined somewhere.Di2015NewLine      int m = 0;Di2015NewLine      foreach (Button button in buttons)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Binding bind = new Binding("Width", this, "ButtonMaxWidth");Di2015NewLine            bind.DataSourceUpdateMode = DataSourceUpdateMode.Never;//This is importantDi2015NewLine            button.DataBindings.Add(bind);        Di2015NewLine            button.AutoSize = true;     Di2015NewLine            if(button.Width > m) m = button.Width;Di2015NewLine            button.SizeChanged += (s, e) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Button but = s as Button;Di2015NewLine                if (but.Width > ButtonMaxWidth)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    but.DataBindings["Width"].WriteValue();Di2015NewLine                } else but.Width = ButtonMaxWidth;Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        ButtonMaxWidth = m;//Initialize the max width, this is done only once and you don't have to loop through your buttons to update the max width because it's done via the mechanism of `Binding` and `event`.Di2015NewLine        //Try changing the Width of any button in your buttons arrayDi2015NewLine        buttons[2].Width = 300;//if this > MaxWidth, all the buttons will change its Width to the new same MaxWidth, otherwise they will stay on the current MaxWidth. 17695335Di2015UniqueSeparator//function for registering a new user and adding their details to the databaseDi2015NewLinepublic function register($username, $password, $email){Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine$time       = time();Di2015NewLine$ip         = $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'];Di2015NewLine$emailCode = sha1($username + microtime());Di2015NewLine$password   = sha1($password);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//prepare statement and bind valuesDi2015NewLine$query  = $this->db->prepare("INSERT INTO `users` (`username`, `password`, `email`, `ip`, `time`, `emailCode`) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) 17695362Di2015UniqueSeparatorfloat Pack(Vector2 input, int precision)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Vector2 output = input;Di2015NewLine    output.x = Mathf.Floor(output.x * (precision - 1));Di2015NewLine    output.y = Mathf.Floor(output.y * (precision - 1));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return (output.x * precision) + output.y;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineVector2 Unpack(float input, int precision)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Vector2 output = Vector2.zero;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    output.y = input % precision;Di2015NewLine    output.x = Mathf.Floor(input / precision);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return output / (precision - 1);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17698392Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string CreateCSVTextFile<T>(List<T> data, string seperator = ",")Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var properties = typeof(T).GetProperties();Di2015NewLine    var result = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var row in data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var values = properties.Select(p => p.GetValue(row, null));Di2015NewLine        var line = string.Join(seperator, values);Di2015NewLine        result.AppendLine(line);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17698392Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string CreateCSVTextFile<T>(List<T> data)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var properties = typeof(T).GetProperties();Di2015NewLine    var result = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var row in data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var values = properties.Select(p => p.GetValue(row, null))Di2015NewLine                               .Select(v => StringToCSVCell(v.ToString()));Di2015NewLine        var line = string.Join(",", values);Di2015NewLine        result.AppendLine(line);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static string StringToCSVCell(string str)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool mustQuote = (str.Contains(",") || str.Contains("\\"") || str.Contains("\\r") || str.Contains("\\n"));Di2015NewLine    if (mustQuote)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("\\"");Di2015NewLine        foreach (char nextChar in str)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(nextChar);Di2015NewLine            if (nextChar == '"')Di2015NewLine                sb.Append("\\"");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sb.Append("\\"");Di2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return str;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

17701488Di2015UniqueSeparator// This method will open the stream, execute the streamClosure, and then close the stream.Di2015NewLinepublic static String StreamWork(Func<Stream, String> streamClosure) {Di2015NewLine    // Set up the stream here.Di2015NewLine    using (Stream stream = new MemoryStream()) { // Pretend the MemoryStream is your actual stream.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Execute the closure. Return it's results.Di2015NewLine        return streamClosure(stream);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
17701488Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunc<Stream, String>
17701488Di2015UniqueSeparatorStreamWork
17701488Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Wrap all of the work that needs to be done in a closure.Di2015NewLine    // This represents all the work that needs to be done while the stream is open.Di2015NewLine    Func<Stream, String> streamClosure = delegate(Stream stream) {Di2015NewLine        using (StreamReader streamReader = new StreamReader(stream)) {Di2015NewLine            return streamReader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Call StreamWork. This method handles creating/closing the stream.Di2015NewLine    String result = StreamWork(streamClosure);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(result);Di2015NewLine    Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
