17705602Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class DataTableHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public enum JoinTypeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Same as regular join. Inner join produces only the set of records that match in both Table A and Table B.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        Inner = 0,Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Same as Left Outer join. Left outer join produces a complete set of records from Table A, with the matching records (where available) in Table B. If there is no match, the right side will contain null.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        Left = 1Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Joins the passed in DataTables on the colToJoinOn.Di2015NewLine    /// <para>Returns an appropriate DataTable with zero rows if the colToJoinOn does not exist in both tables.</para>Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="dtblLeft"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="dtblRight"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="colToJoinOn"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="joinType"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    /// <remarks>Di2015NewLine    /// <para>http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2379747/create-combined-datatable-from-two-datatables-joined-with-linq-c-sharp?rq=1</para>Di2015NewLine    /// <para>http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/vstudio/bb397895.aspx</para>Di2015NewLine    /// <para>http://www.codinghorror.com/blog/2007/10/a-visual-explanation-of-sql-joins.html</para>Di2015NewLine    /// <para>http://stackoverflow.com/questions/406294/left-join-and-left-outer-join-in-sql-server</para>Di2015NewLine    /// </remarks>Di2015NewLine    public static DataTable JoinTwoDataTablesOnOneColumn(DataTable dtblLeft, DataTable dtblRight, string colToJoinOn, JoinType joinType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Change column name to a temp name so the LINQ for getting row data will work properly.Di2015NewLine        string strTempColName = colToJoinOn + "_2";Di2015NewLine        if (dtblRight.Columns.Contains(colToJoinOn))Di2015NewLine            dtblRight.Columns[colToJoinOn].ColumnName = strTempColName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Get columns from dtblLeftDi2015NewLine        DataTable dtblResult = dtblLeft.Clone();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Get columns from dtblRightDi2015NewLine        var dt2Columns = dtblRight.Columns.OfType<DataColumn>().Select(dc => new DataColumn(dc.ColumnName, dc.DataType, dc.Expression, dc.ColumnMapping));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Get columns from dtblRight that are not in dtblLeftDi2015NewLine        var dt2FinalColumns = from dc in dt2Columns.AsEnumerable()Di2015NewLine                              where !dtblResult.Columns.Contains(dc.ColumnName)Di2015NewLine                              select dc;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Add the rest of the columns to dtblResultDi2015NewLine        dtblResult.Columns.AddRange(dt2FinalColumns.ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //No reason to continue if the colToJoinOn does not exist in both DataTables.Di2015NewLine        if (!dtblLeft.Columns.Contains(colToJoinOn) || (!dtblRight.Columns.Contains(colToJoinOn) && !dtblRight.Columns.Contains(strTempColName)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!dtblResult.Columns.Contains(colToJoinOn))Di2015NewLine                dtblResult.Columns.Add(colToJoinOn);Di2015NewLine            return dtblResult;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        switch (joinType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine            case JoinType.Inner:Di2015NewLine                #region InnerDi2015NewLine                //get row dataDi2015NewLine                //To use the DataTable.AsEnumerable() extension method you need to add a reference to the System.Data.DataSetExtension assembly in your project. Di2015NewLine                var rowDataLeftInner = from rowLeft in dtblLeft.AsEnumerable()Di2015NewLine                                       join rowRight in dtblRight.AsEnumerable() on rowLeft[colToJoinOn] equals rowRight[strTempColName]Di2015NewLine                                       select rowLeft.ItemArray.Concat(rowRight.ItemArray).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Add row data to dtblResultDi2015NewLine                foreach (object[] values in rowDataLeftInner)Di2015NewLine                    dtblResult.Rows.Add(values);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                #endregionDi2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case JoinType.Left:Di2015NewLine                #region LeftDi2015NewLine                var rowDataLeftOuter = from rowLeft in dtblLeft.AsEnumerable()Di2015NewLine                                       join rowRight in dtblRight.AsEnumerable() on rowLeft[colToJoinOn] equals rowRight[strTempColName] into gjDi2015NewLine                                       from subRight in gj.DefaultIfEmpty()Di2015NewLine                                       select rowLeft.ItemArray.Concat((subRight== null) ? (dtblRight.NewRow().ItemArray) :subRight.ItemArray).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Add row data to dtblResultDi2015NewLine                foreach (object[] values in rowDataLeftOuter)Di2015NewLine                    dtblResult.Rows.Add(values);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                #endregionDi2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Change column name back to originalDi2015NewLine        dtblRight.Columns[strTempColName].ColumnName = colToJoinOn;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Remove extra column from resultDi2015NewLine        dtblResult.Columns.Remove(strTempColName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return dtblResult;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
